function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Supply chain disruptions and workflow issues in the construction industry due to COVID-19","Impact":"Delays in construction projects, increased costs, and potential economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementing backup suppliers, optimizing workflow processes, and developing contingency plans for supply chain disruptions","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, automation in construction processes, and virtual project management tools","People":"Built asset procurement professionals, construction workers, and stakeholders in the construction industry","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Health and safety risks in indoor spaces due to COVID-19","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks among indoor workers","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety guidelines, providing personal protective equipment, and improving indoor ventilation systems","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and smart building technologies for monitoring occupancy and air quality","People":"Indoor workers, employees in indoor spaces, and visitors to indoor construction sites","Owner":"Employers, building managers, and health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Legal implications and contract revisions due to COVID-19","Impact":"Uncertainty in contractual obligations, disputes over force majeure claims, and financial implications for businesses","Mitigation":"Consulting legal experts, revising contracts to include pandemic-specific clauses, and aligning with government regulations and guidelines","Technologies":"Contract management software, digital contracts with built-in flexibility, and blockchain for secure contract management","People":"Business owners, contractors, legal professionals, and government regulators","Owner":"Legal departments, business owners, and industry associations"}]}
